title: Projects

web.name: OwnIt ltd
web.p1: OwnIt is an e-commerce site for buying cheap and beautiful clothes.
web.p2: Please know that this is a template, so none of the functions will work!

web.name: My First Portfolio
web.p1: This was my first portfolio. I didn't put it on the net till recently.
web.p2: The site is a static and a non-functional site.

web.name: Rubby Travels
web.p1: Rubby Travels is a site dedicated to bringing you closer to your dream vacation, from picking a destination to booking the flight. All brought to you in one site.
p2: and I. I was assigned to work on the frontend of the site.

web.name: JustInTime Travels
web.p1: JustInTime Travels is a beautiful site filled with tons of vacation trips. See all the beautiful places and book a flight there easily.
p2: and I was assigned to develop the frontend of the site.

web.name: Medcom Training Solution
web.p1: Like all great websites, Medcom provides training on health care and other health-related topics. Their courses have been approved by CPD.
p2: and I was in charge of the frontend and other major designs.

flutter.name: Holy Calculator
flutter.p1: I made this app specifically for the church. It can be use to get the sum total of your money in naira, from 1000 naira to 5 naira.
flutter.p2: You can download the app and give it a try.

flutter.name: My Country Weather
flutter.p1: A weather app that gives you the current weather data for your location. And not just that, it also gives you access to check the weather of any country in the world.
flutter.p2: To get the full ideal of the app, download it here.

flutter.name: We Chat
flutter.p1: Your way of chatting with all your closest friends. Share this app with them, and you all can chat in a group.
flutter.p2: What are you waiting for? get the app.

others.name: Upcoming Project
others.p1: This project helps you do your day to day activities faster and more efficiently.
others.p2: With just a click of a button, your dreams can become your reality.

footer: This website was designed by Ewoma Etemire to display his projects.
